ohuge inimata hathare pahara 11 athulath wiya.dakunu aprikanu bhumiyedi shathakayak wartha kala dewani pithikaru lesa da samarawira wartha pothata ekwiya.eeta pera 2002/03 tharagawarayedi hashan thilakarathna senchuriyan hidi lakunu 104k laba gaththeya.dinaya arambaena wita nodawi siti samarawira ha rangana herath dakunu aprikanu pandu yawannan manasika pasubamakata lak kala athara 8 wani kadullata watina lakunu 46ka sambandhathawak goda naguha.shri lanka inime kadulu 7k binda damamin wartha pothata ekwimata wegapandu yawana kridaka marchant di lange samathwiya.ohu laba gath kadulu 7 mangala test inimedi dakunu aprikanu pandu yawannaku wartha kala dewani ihalama daskama we.

sama anugrahaka ratawala niyojithayan sanduda sakachcha mesaye amerikawa, brithanyaya, montinigrowa, masidoniyawa saha murusi rajyaye sama anugrahakathwayen eksath jathinge manawa himikam mandalayata idiripath kerena yojanawa mulika ketumpathata wada dadi kerenu athi bawa manawa himikam kriyadharayo pawasathi.yojanawe mulika ketumpatha sambandhayen sanduda jiniwa nuwara pawathwuna sakachchawedi eya thawath dadi karana men kanadawa, switsarlanthaya saha batahira yuropa ratawal illa siti bawa jiniwa nuwara wesena madhyawedi sunanda deshapriya bibisi sandeshayata kiya sitiyeya.manawa himikam pilibanda maha komasariswariyage karyalaya yatathe shri lankawa sambandha parikshanayak pawathwiya yuthu bawa sandahan karamin mulika ketumpatha boho durata sanshodhanaya kerenu athi hadak daknata labena bawayi, sunanda deshapriya sandahan kale.balaya bedima
